PSCT.Base: Once per turn, when a monster(s) you control is Tributed to activate a card or effect other than this card's: Special Summon 1 "Mecha Phantom Beast Token" (Machine-Type/WIND/Level 3/ATK 0/DEF 0). This card's Level is increased by the total Levels of all "Mecha Phantom Beast Tokens" you control. While you control a Token, this card cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects. Once per turn: You can Tribute 1 Token; Special Summon 1 "Mecha Phantom Beast" monster from your hand.
